page.title: 14ATTITUDES
page.content: The villagers and other people in our area, when asked commented about how{friendly}their village was. People who were comparatively new to the area could remember people ringing them up and asking them to join in with the{entertainments}held. Most of the people we talked to seemed very glad to help us. Although our area was not very highly populated they had much entertainment,this was very popular with the villagers and helped them remain close. Everyone in Rhydycroesau agreed that the village shop was very useful.Most people said that they only used the village shop for vital every-day items and went to Oswestry most of the time for large{shopping}expeditions. Many houses had freezers and were able to store large amounts of food safely without deterioration..
